security: Disclosing that the CIA is using student informants ('police agent') and their efforts to recruit assets such as 'Watsonasset' could damage ongoing operations and compromise relationships with liaison contacts.
summary: A CIA message discusses an asset named Watsonasset refusing to work as an informant due to security concerns and the potential compromise of students, and then discusses a meeting regarding the Russian professors flap.
summary_one_paragraph: This classified message relays information about 'Watsonasset' declining to serve as an informant due to security concerns, citing a previous case of a compromised student. Watsonasset suggested working for SIS because of its relationship with the Cultural Attache. The message also reports on a meeting regarding the "Russian professors flap", and a decision to pause further action until advised, and requests identification of a REP mentioned in a previous reference.
title: Provide Details of Approach to WH/DV Cuba CubanDef Tapi Liaison Asset
